question: What is the name of the leading development institution headquartered in Ptuj, Slovenia?
asked_question_translated: Mis on selle juhtiva arenguasutuse nimi, mille peakorter asub Ptujis, Sloveenias?
answer: Selle juhtiva arenguasutuse nimi on Ptujski Razvojni Center (Ptuj Development Center).
answer_translated_eng: The name of its lead development agency is the Ptujski Razvojni Center (Ptuj Development Center).
